entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 9:47 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:47 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 60%
